title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 520.12 - Disposition of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 520.12 - Disposition of records

State Regulations
(a) The
disposition of documents of non-judicial punishment actions is governed by
applicable ANG documents of AF regulations. (b) The unit CBPO will retain the record of
the non-judicial punishment action as part of the member's permanent
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
520.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
